item.description:
Retreat will run Thursday, October 13th through Sunday, October 16, 2011.

$50 deposit is required by 3/25 to reserve your spot at the retreat.  A minimum of 20 people are required for our reservation at the CCSC facility. Please contact Jen H. regarding refund policy if you have questions but in general, refunds will only be granted if we do not fall below our required 20 people and if final payments have not been made to the CCSC for your reservation.  If you are able to find someone to take you place then a full refund will be granted.
item.why: This is our fourth annual long-weekend Fall retreat! More details to come as they become available. A $50 deposit is required. You will receive an email with instructions for submitting your deposit after you RSVP 'Yes' to this event.

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Retreat 2011: Cape Cod Sea Camps
